Articles.Content:
I'd like to know if the following mods are compatible with KSP 0.21, and with each other:

*ISA MapSat

*Kethane

*MechJeb (I've landed on Duna, I think I'm skilled enough that I can use it without cheating )

*Subassembly

*Chatterer

Links to these, if they are compatible, would also be nice. Thanks!

I'm using

Kethane

MechJeb 2

Chatterer

No problems with compatibility. I don't think you'll have any problems with Subassembly Manager, which seems to be working in 0.21 (I don't use it). I don't think ISA Mapsat is working yet.

In the future, you can easily search this forum for mods:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/35-Add-on-Releases-and-Projects-Showcase

When I dropped Kethane into the KSP folder--LIKE I WAS SUPPOSED TO-it broke all the parts, making all the ships unloadable. Good thing I made a backup.

Edited August 17, 2013 by The Jedi Master

When I dropped Kethane into the KSP folder--LIKE I WAS SUPPOSED TO-it broke all the parts, making all the ships unloadable. Good thing I made a backup.

It should be in the "Kerbal Space Program/GameData" folder. You should get the latest version. if you don't already have it.

It should be in the "Kerbal Space Program/GameData" folder. You should get the latest version. if you don't already have it.

OOOOH, I thought you just popped it into the main game folder. Thanks!

UPDATE: Kethane, Chatterer and MechJeb are all working as of 8/17/2013!

Edited August 17, 2013 by The Jedi Master
ISA mapsat works, but when I put the satilite dish on my stuff, framerates drop to unplayable amounts. Took forever to figure out what was causing my issues.
